attributes.action: convert the current 26th June Veterans Day into a national holiday to remember the sacrifice of the fallen and support those who have suffered in wars and conflicts in the service of our nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To show our gratitude for those who have given their all in defense of our freedom and to show support for our troops who are currently defending our freedom, The United Kingdom and our Commonwealth partners should hold a day of celebration and reflection in the form of a National Veterans Day holiday.

This should be promoted within our schools, Scouts, Brownies, Girl’s Guide Brigade, Boy’s Brigade, Sea, Air and Army cadets and they should be encouraged to take part in a national celebration.
